bill.title: Relating to information required of building inspectors in reports; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Provides that Director of Department of Consumer and Business Services require in state building code that building inspectors identify in all inspection reports name of person that performed work that requires building inspection and permit number that applies to work or state that owner performed work on owner's own property. Provides that Director of Department of Consumer and Business Services require in state building code that building inspectors identify in all inspection reports name of person that performed work that requires building inspection and permit number that applies to work or state that owner performed work on owner's own property. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.

history.action: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
